title: Vinnie's Pizzeria - Greenpoint
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, Italian, Fast food, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A small upbeat fun New York style pizzeria has a separate section of vegan choices including slices/whole pizza, mock chicken wings, garlic knots, a large variety of toppings and desserts. Vegan items are separated from items containing meat/dairy. Live music. Very popular. As of August 2014, has one other location in Brooklyn.
